title: BBB Hub
subtitle: E-Learning Platform
para1: Worked on some important features like referral reward system for students, dark mode & state management etc.
para2: Used Nextjs along with ant design to create a seamless and responsive frontend.

title: Kanban Board
subtitle: Your ToDo Buddy
para1: Developed Kanban board having a User Interface Like Notion
para2: It has a filter to show tasks according to either its status or by user who created it.
